ALT-R.BK.summary: ALT Telecom Public Company Limited engages in the manufacture, installation, maintenance, rental, and sale of telecommunication network equipment in Thailand and internationally. It operates through three segments: Network Equipment Distribution Business, Network Equipment Installation Business, and Network Equipment Rental Business. The company distributes telecommunication products comprising fiber optic cables, telecom shelters, antennas, and other telecommunication equipment, as well as rapid deployment products. It is also involved in the construction of base stations; installation of equipment and optical fiber cables; lease and management of telecommunication basic structures; and sale, installation, and maintenance of electrical equipment and systems. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bang Kruai, Thailand. ALT Telecom Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of ALT Holding Co., Ltd.

ILINK-R.BK.summary: Interlink Communication Public Company Limited imports and distributes IT network cabling system products in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Distribution Business, Telecommunication Business, and Engineering Business. It also outsources design and installation service of network and cabling system for computers and telecommunications. In addition, the company operates as a telecommunication service provider, which invests in the construction of fiber-optic cable network to provide high-speed leased line service; and a contractor in submarine cable and transmission lines, including fiber optic and high voltage. Further, it provides data center services, such as co-location, cloud computing, and disaster recovery to enterprise customers. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

THCOM-R.BK.summary: Thaicom Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides transponder services for domestic and international communications. The company operates through three segments: Satellite and Related Services, Internet and Media Services, and Telephone Business Abroad. It also offers broadband content, internet data center, Internet, satellite uplink-downlink, broadcasting television, telecommunications, telephone network, and mobile content services. In addition, the company sells user terminal iPSTAR, as well as direct television equipment. Further, it is involved in the provision of technical support services in relation to satellite business, as well as engineering and development services on communication technology and electronics; and system integration consultancy services for broadband networks. The company has operations in Thailand, Singapore, Cambodia, Lao PDR, Australia, New Zealand, Mauritius, the British Virgin Islands, Japan, and India. Thaicom Public Company Limited was founded in 1991 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPS-R.BK.long_name: The Practical Solution Public Company Limited
TPS-R.BK.summary: The Practical Solution Public Company Limited provides solutions for network computing and e-business. It engages in the distribution and installation of computer network systems, fully integrated communication systems, wireless communication systems, network security systems, and data center solutions and management systems. The company also offers consultancy services, such as LAN/WAN infrastructure, intranet/Internet, security system, IP telephony, network management system, design and best practice recommendation, network troubleshooting, and network equipment assessment. In addition, it provides network system management and maintenance services. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
